reviews.title: Addictive !!!!
reviews.content:
The STYLEKOREAN Pore Blur Box is a curated set designed to minimize the appearance of pores and create a smooth, flawless base for makeup. It typically includes a primer, setting powder, and sometimes other pore-blurring products. The idea is to provide a complete routine for achieving that coveted airbrushed look.

The effectiveness of the Pore Blur Box really depends on the specific products included. Generally, the primer works to fill in pores and create a smooth canvas, the setting powder helps to lock everything in place and further blur imperfections. The quality of the individual products can vary, so it's worth checking reviews of the specific items in the box.

Overall, the Pore Blur Box can be a good option for those looking to try out pore-blurring products without committing to full-sized items. It's a convenient way to experiment with different products and see what works best for your skin. Just make sure to research the specific products regarding your skin type.

reviews.title: Review: 2025 Rookies Box
reviews.content:
I recently tried the 2025 Rookies Box, a curated monthly subscription box filled with nine full-size skincare products. As someone who loves discovering new brands but doesn’t always know where to start, this box offered a great mix of essentials and indulgent treats.

Packaging & First Impressions:
The box arrived beautifully packaged—clean, minimal, and eco-friendly. Each product was securely packed, and the insert card gave a quick breakdown of what’s inside, including usage tips and ingredient highlights.

Value for Money:
For the price (around $39), the box is a great value considering the quality and full sizes of the products. It’s a smart way to try new products without committing to full-priced items from unfamiliar brands.

description:
Description

Beauty of Joseon Rice Wonderland 
- Relief Sun Aqua Fresh 50ml
: For those who loved our Relief Sun but found it a bit too rich, introducing Relief Sun Aqua-fresh. 
This new formula is crafted with rice seed water and panthenol to deliver refreshing hydration while safeguarding your skin from harmful UV rays and environmental stressors. 
Designed for those who prefer a sheer, non-greasy finish, Relief Sun Aqua-fresh provides the same benefits as the original Relief Sun—no white cast, no stickiness—plus enhanced hydration and a quick-absorbing, dewy finish.
- Glow Deep Serum : Rice +Alpha-Arbutin30ml
: This serum is designed for those with concerns about pigmentation and uneven skin tone. Containing 68% rice bran water and 2% alpha arbutin, it helps to improve skin tone to become brighter and healthier. - Ground Rice and Honey Glow Mask 150ml
: Discover the power of rice and honey with our new wash-off mask, the Ground Rice and Honey Glow Mask. This mask harnesses the power of upcycled makgeolli lees, a byproduct of traditional Korean rice wine, to deliver potent skin benefits. Enriched with natural rice hull powder and 5% honey, it provides deep hydration, improves skin texture, and helps soothe inflammatory skin conditions like acne. - Glow Replenishing Rice Milk 150ml
: During the Joseon Dynasty, rice bran water, known as migamsu, was used to beautify the skin, much like today's toner or essence. Glow Replenishing Rice Milk modernizes this tradition to maximize skincare benefits. The nutrient-rich rice extract and rice amino acids penetrate deeply to hydrate and smooth dry, rough skin. This toner features a unique dual-layer formula: a moisture layer filled with rice extract for hydration and a powder layer to control sebum. It helps soothe sensitive skin and create a smoother texture, making it an ideal choice for achieving a radiant complexion.- (Gift) Hand mirror

reviews.title: All 4 of the ampoules are great!
reviews.content: I'd say all 4 of these ampoules have good absorption, happy with this layer of clean hydration, maintaining clearer skin, seemingly unscented to me, which is great for those of your who are sensitive to scented things. All 4 also seem to work well on my sensitive skin and keep me well hydrated despite the thin lightweight texture. They're actually great for layer and i never get sticky or oily from reapplying. Of the 4 bottles, the green tea-trica ampoule seems like the most lightweight in terms of texture. I like using this one when I'm breaking out and along my T-zone area. I believe the pink poremizing ampoule and the viral brightening capsule ampoule both boasts about their pore minimizing effects, I take that with a grain of salt considering the science of pores, but the hydration layer delivered is keeping my skin texture and tone where I like it. These are now part of my regular daily application for the face. I feel this is effective for clean hydration for me anyway

description:
Description


A trial, travel skin care routine with 4 different BALANCEFUL products: 3 Sachets of Cleansing Gel (LHA Face Wash), 3 Sachets Toner Pads (2 Sheets for Each Sachet), Facial Serum (0.34 Fl Oz), and Facial Moisturizer (0.68 Fl. Oz.) 
1. [Balanceful Cleansing Gel] is a soothing daily facial cleanser blended with Centella Asiatica Extract (Gotu Kola) and LHA (Lipohydroxy Acid) for soothing, exfoliating, and removing dirt and impurities.
2. [Balanceful Toner Pad] is a gentle exfoliating pad soaked with Cica essence. Not only the essence but also the pad is vegan for sustainability. Effectively soothes, hydrates, and preps skin.
3. [Balanceful Serum] is a balancing treatment serum supercharged with Centella Asiatica Concentrate, providing instant hydration, soothing, and balancing.
4. [Balanceful Cream] is a daily moisturizer that completes your skin care routine by adding extra hydration with Panthenol and Hyaluronic acid
How To Use
1. Massage the cleansing gel on the unmoistened face. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
2. After cleansing, use the embossed side to wipe on troubled spots, and use the plain side to wipe over the entire face.
3. After cleansing and toning, dispense 3-5 drops of the serum and gently massage it into your skin.
4. At the last step of your skincare routine, take a proper amount of the cream and spread it over your entire face.

description:
Description

1. SOMEBYMI™ Snail Truecica Low pH Gel Cleanser
- A mild and gentle cleanser that heal damaged skin and strengthen the skin barrier.
- It has Amino Acid Complex, Ceramide, and Panthenol that allows you to maintain plumper, firmer complexion while repairing fragile skin conditions and creating a moisture barrier to lock in skin moisture.
2. SOMEBYMI™ Snail Truecica Miracle Repair Toner
- It provides an instant boost of hydration and protects the skin from the ultraviolet and has a brightening effect and anti-wrinkle effect.
- It repairs skin and heal damaged skin and has whitening ingredients for skin pigmentation care and stop melanin production.

- It soothes skin and reinforces skin barrier with Truecica™ as well as removes blemishes and scar with a non-sticky finish.
- It regenerates the skin from damage, removes deep acne scars and recover skin from dark blemish.
4. SOMEBYMI™ Snail Truecica Miracle Repair Cream
- It helps strengthen the skin barrier that can protect the skin from external stress and can be applied to any skin type leaving it soft and smooth.
- It soothes damaged and sensitive skin and helps diminish troubled scars.

Suggested Use

1. Gel Cleanser 
- Squeeze onto wet hands and create a lather. 
- Smoothly massage over the face.
- Thoroughly rinse with lukewarm water afterward.
2. Toner
- After cleansing, apply a small amount to your face.

- Gently pat onto skin for better absorption.
3. Serum 
- After toner, apply a proper amount on the face and pat for better absorption. 
4. Cream
- Take an appropriate amount and apply evenly on the face.
- Gently pat for better absorption.

Description


Works as exfoliator to leave skin cleaner and more radiant than before!
Contain of Tea Tree 10,000ppm, AHA/BHA/PHA/Niacinamide 2%, 20 kinds nature plants extract.
Pore care, brightening, moisturizing!
AHA: Removes impurities and dry flakes from skin surface.
BHA: Exfoliates pores, removing clogged impurities and sebum.
PHA: Stops losing moisture from skin, dissolving dead skin cell.
Works as effective exfoliator to leave skin cleaner and more radiant than before! Perfect exfoliator toner to use everyday!

This Starter Kit consists of:
AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Cleansing Bar 30g
AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Toner 30ml
AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Serum 10ml
AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Cream 20g
Suggested Use


AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Cleansing Bar:
Roll massage your cheeks.Massage your nose up and down.Roll massage your forehead below the hairline.Carefully massage near your eyes and mouth.

AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Toner:
After cleansing in the morning and evening, take an appropriate amount on a cotton swab, wipe it off along with the texture of the skin, and let it absorb lightly.

AHA.BHA.PHA 30 Days Miracle Cream:
Apply a bean-size amount on skin. Spread until the application melts and penetrates into skin, and then wrap the face with both palms to promote absorption into skin.

Miracle Serum:
Apply at the serum or essence routine, take 3-4 drops and gently massage to spread over face.
